name: ShiftPixy, Inc.
description: ShiftPixy, Inc. is a technology-driven human capital management company that specializes in providing workforce solutions for the gig economy. Founded in 2015, ShiftPixy aims to simplify the employment process for businesses and workers alike by leveraging its proprietary technology platform. The company focuses on offering a unique blend of staffing, payroll, and compliance services to its clients, primarily in the restaurant and hospitality sectors. ShiftPixy's innovative approach allows businesses to tap into a flexible workforce while ensuring compliance with labor laws and regulations. The company is dedicated to enhancing the overall employee experience by providing benefits and support to its gig workers, promoting a more sustainable and efficient employment model. With a vision to transform the way businesses manage their workforce, ShiftPixy is at the forefront of the shift towards a more flexible and adaptive labor market, helping businesses thrive in a rapidly changing economic landscape.
